inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: within the 2 weeks prior to the procedure visit for removal

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: shockwave lithotripsy [SWL], ureteroscopy [URS], retrograde intrarenal surgery [RIRS], percutaneous nephrolithotomy

notes: 78 year-old male with history of BPH and multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. He has a severe bulbar urethral stricture that requires surgical fixation.
